text: Quanzhou () is a prefecture-level port city on the north bank of the Jin River, in southern Fujian Province, China. It is beside the Taiwan Strait. In 2020, 8,782,285 people lived there. It was visited by both travelers Marco Polo and Ibn Battuta. ==Other websites== *"How to Pronounce Quanzhou - PronounceNames.com". Published on YouTube.com *How To Say Quanzhou. Emma Saying, on YouTube Category:Cities in China Category:Fujian
title: Quanzhou
